item.title: United States Supreme Court Weighs New LGBTQ+ Rights Cases
item.author: Alex Hodges,
item.description: Protection from dismissal on the grounds of sexual orientation or gender identity was up for debate before the US Supreme Court this week, in the first three LGBTQ rights cases of the last 2 years. The cases referenced Title VII of the Civil Rights Act, which bans discrimination in hiring, pay, and â€¦
